title: Thirteen men and four women, including woman seated in center wearing short sleeve patterned dress, corsage, and necklace, gathered around banquet table with light colored tablecloth, place setting, and floral arrangement, in front of stage with floral arrangement, light colored curtain, two wall hung speakers, and sign inscribed "17th Anniversary", in interior with wooden floor, pendant ceiling fixture and streamers on ceiling, man in background standing next to piano
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
